subject: Smalltalk was: Re: how to use ExceptionTestCase ?
msgSnippet: ... Cool.. and I see that you re now partnering with Concom.  Things are starting to look promising. Dave
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Michael Silverstein"
<msilverstein@s...> wrote:
> Another data point: We have seen demand for our automated testing tools
> for Smalltalk increase in the last 6-9 months, both from existing
> customers and new customers.

Cool.. and I see that you're now partnering with Concom. Things are
starting to look promising.

Dave
